text: The flag of Eswatini, (Also known as Swaziland) was adopted on October 6, 1968 (on Independence) == Appearance == It has a horizontal bands of blue (top and bottom) and the yellow-edged red (triple width) with the large black and white Nguni shield covering two spears and the staff decorated with the feather tassels called injobo (tassels-bunches of feathers of the widowbird and the lourie) all centered horizontally of the red band. ==References== ==Other websites== * Eswatini Category:Eswatini
title: Flag of Eswatini
